org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id WHERE issues.root_id = "$1" AND issues.lft < 2 AND issues.rgt > 3 AND issue_statuses.is_closed = "$2" LIMIT "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM issues WHERE issues.root_id = "$1" AND issues.lft < 2 AND issues.rgt > 3 LIMIT "$3"
